name: Banana Oatmeal Pancakes
instructions: Place the oats, Greek yogurt, eggs, milk, melted butter, brown sugar, vanilla, baking powder and kosher salt in a blender. Blend on high until a smooth batter forms. Mash the bananas, then stir them into the blender with a spatula.Then Cook!
